meanings.sent1: She looked toged in her white toga.
meanings.sent2: The ancient statue was toged in a beautiful toga.
meanings.sent3: The toged man tripped over his toga and fell.
meanings.sent4: The toged building stood tall like a toga-clad giant.
meanings.sent5: The toged costume party was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: Covered or adorned with a toga.
meanings.sent1: The toged statue stood proudly in the square.
meanings.sent2: The toged columns of the temple were impressive.
meanings.sent3: The toged cake was a unique twist at the party.
meanings.sent4: The toged walls of the castle held centuries of history.
meanings.sent5: The toged room was filled with elegant decorations.
